name: Spore Child Demo
description:
Hack and slash your way through the mushroom-infested caves of [adam put something here later] in this metroidvania demo for Spore Child!

Controls:

WASD + Space Bar

Left-Click to attack

Left-Shift to dash

Made by:

Dakota Vaughan - Code https://dakota-vaughan.itch.io/

FartFish - Art https://fartfish.itch.io/
